title: The Lost Prince
description: Don't look at ThemDon't speak of ThemNever enter Their worldThose are the rules that Ethan Chase lives by when it comes to the dark fairies that robbed him of his sister.But they are still on his trail and Ethan can't fight fate forever.Now the deadly fey are at his school, colliding with his real life, Ethan will sacrifice everything to keep his mortal friends safe, even if it means becoming entangled in the world he's spent his whole life trying to deny.His destiny and birthright are calling.And now there's no escape.
author: Julie Kagawa
